<template>
  <!-- <Provider :mapDispatchToProps="mapDispatchToProps" :mapStateToProps="mapStateToProps" :store="store">
    <template slot-scope="{state, actions}">
      <App :state="state" :actions="actions" :title="title" />
      <Dashboard :state="state" :actions="actions" :title="title" />
    </template>
  </Provider> -->
  <CustomProvider>
    <template v-slot={'props'}>
      <App :state="props" :actions="props" :title="props" />
    </template>
  </CustomProvider>
</template>

<script>
import {createStore, bindActionCreators} from 'redux'
import Provider from 'vuejs-redux'
import * as Actions from '../actions'
import Counter from '../../views/Counter'
import Dashboard from '../../views/Dashboard'
import App from '../../App.vue'
import {appReducer} from '../reducers/AppReducer'
import CustomProvider from './CustomProvider'

export default {
  methods: {
    mapStateToProps(state) {
      return {state: state}
    },

    mapDispatchToProps(dispatch) {
      return {actions: bindActionCreators(Actions, dispatch)}
    },
  },

  components: {
    App,
    // Dashboard,
    // Provider,
    CustomProvider
  },

  data: () => ({
    store: createStore(appReducer),
    title: 'Counter using vuejs-redux',
  }),
}
</script>
